name: My Analysis 2026-02-06
summary: This contract contains 6 clauses. 3 high risk and 2 medium risk found.

clauses.clause: 1. Unlimited Liability The Contractor shall be fully liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, without limitation in amount or duration.
obligations: Unlimited Liability The Contractor shall be fully liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, without limitation in amount or duration.
clauses.suggestion: Add a liability cap and exclude indirect damages.

clauses.clause: 2. Unilateral Termination The Company reserves the right to terminate this agreement at any time without notice or compensation.
3. No Payment Guarantee Payments may be withheld at the sole discretion of the Company, regardless of services rendered.
4. Intellectual Property Transfer All work, ideas, and derivatives created by the Contractor shall automatically become the exclusive property of the Company without additional compensation.
obligations: Intellectual Property Transfer All work, ideas, and derivatives created by the Contractor shall automatically become the exclusive property of the Company without additional compensation.

clauses.clause: 5. Indemnification Clause The Contractor agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Company against all claims, losses, or legal actions, including those arising from the Companyâ€™s own negligence.
clauses.suggestion: Limit indemnity to direct damages and cap liability to contract value.

clauses.clause: 6. Governing Law This agreement shall be governed by the laws of a jurisdiction chosen solely by the Company. WARNING: This contract contains multiple high-risk clauses that may be unfavorable to one party.
obligations: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of a jurisdiction chosen solely by the Company.
clauses.suggestion: Specify neutral arbitration location within India.
